kieker.tools.bridge.connector.tcp

类 TCPMultiServerPortListenerRunnable

  • java.lang.Object
    • kieker.tools.bridge.connector.tcp.TCPMultiServerPortListenerRunnable
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TCPMultiServerPortListenerRunnable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Runnable class implementing a thread listening for an incoming connection for monitoring data. It then starts a connection thread handling the actual data transmissions.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.8
    作者:
    Reiner Jung

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      TCPMultiServerPortListenerRunnable(int port, java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<IMonitoringRecord> recordQueue, java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<java.lang.Integer,LookupEntity> lookupEntityMap, java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor)
      Create a listener for the incoming port of the multi server.

    • 方法概要

      Main loop of the port listener.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TCPMultiServerPortListenerRunnable

        public TCPMultiServerPortListenerRunnable(int port,
                                          java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<IMonitoringRecord> recordQueue,
                                          java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<java.lang.Integer,LookupEntity> lookupEntityMap,
                                          java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Create a listener for the incoming port of the multi server.
        参数:
        port - IP port to listen to
        recordQueue - the central queue for incoming data records
        lookupEntityMap - lookup map for IMonitoringRecord types
        executor - the thread pool
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - when no server socket can be created

    • 方法详细资料

        public void run()
        Main loop of the port listener.
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable
